name: 吳昭正
objective: This course mainly consists of invited talks and students' presentations
schedule: Invited talks or students' presentation will be arranged every week. Every student is supposed to make a presentation at least once per semester.
scorePolicy:
The final score consists of presentation and participation scores. The presentation score will be given by the average score of the audience, and the participation score will be based on the number of participation times.

Presentation 60%
Participation 40%

covid19.courseScoreMethod: The final score consists of presentation and participation scores. Both scores will be collected online by Zuvio.
covid19.courseInfo: Invited talks and students' presentations will be given online based on the original schedule.
